channel.title: [Experienced Client Developer Needed]
channel.description: I have a server I've been coding for a few months now. Started off from Deception client and server which is based off Exitium/Xyle which is based off Pi. So please have experience coding with these! My other developer has gone away and I am now working on this project on my own. I'm looking for an advanced client developer + basic server coding skills aswell. Post or PM me with information on what skills you have + your experience. I'd post pictures and all that stuff but I'd rather not waste time uploading when I can be coding. Please don't post if you don't even know how to do basic stuff... This is a serious request. pk.pkcity - Skype If you add me on skype please tell me who you are so I don't deny the request.

item.title: [Experienced Client Developer Needed]
item.dc:creator: @Intel_Pro Intel_Pro
item.description:
@Intel_Pro wrote:

I have a server I’ve been coding for a few months now.
Started off from Deception client and server which is based off Exitium/Xyle which is based off Pi.
So please have experience coding with these!
My other developer has gone away and I am now working on this project on my own.
I’m looking for an advanced client developer + basic server coding skills aswell.
Post or PM me with information on what skills you have + your experience.
I’d post pictures and all that stuff but I’d rather not waste time uploading when I can be coding.
Please don’t post if you don’t even know how to do basic stuff… This is a serious request.
pk.pkcity - Skype
If you add me on skype please tell me who you are so I don’t deny the request.

Read full topic
